errors.formattedMessage: contracts/library/SafhMath.sol: Warning: SPDX license identifier not provided in source file. Before publishing, consider adding a comment containing "SPDX-License-Identifier: <SPDX-License>" to each source file. Use "SPDX-License-Identifier: UNLICENSED" for non-open-source code. Please see https://spdx.org for more information.
errors.message: SPDX license identifier not provided in source file. Before publishing, consider adding a comment containing "SPDX-License-Identifier: <SPDX-License>" to each source file. Use "SPDX-License-Identifier: UNLICENSED" for non-open-source code. Please see https://spdx.org for more information.

documentation.text:
@title SafeMath
 @dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
@dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
@dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
@dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
@dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
